title: Map of Online Communities
content:
Typophile is in there... it’s one of those tiny islands.... right?

 [‹ Helvetica Movie - additonal screenings in Columbus Ohio](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007161214/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33486 "Go to previous forum topic") [Half Nelson credits ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007161214/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33455 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jared Benson

comments.content: Ah, but does it have a flashy storefront in Second Life? :-)
I thought I saw it there. Just offshore. It looks bold if you use binoculars. And sometimes, when the wind blows, it looks italic.
waaaaah! i thought there was a map. ;- )
I think it’s more like 5 little islands very close together, resembling a certain roman glyph...

“in a distant land, far from the world at large, a place only inhabited by ...”

ChrisL

This is a little unrealistic. There is a huge - HUGE - community of piracy. Perhaps the ocean could be for them. That would almost be right.

[http://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/online\_communities.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007161214/http:/imgs.xkcd.com/comics/online_communities.png "http://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/online\_communities.png")
Does it have a tavern called the Admiral Bembo?
